name: PNote
description:
This tiny script provides the syntax, folding function and other minor functionality that I need for my notes.

I try to keep al my notes in simple plain ASCII text files. However I admit that some formating and folding is nice. Hence I came up with a very simple syntax based on some markers and indentation rules, wrap all that together into this Vim script and Voil√†! Now I can keep my text notes within a compressed style and smart folding along the power of Vim to ease the access to my notes.

You can get a longer description and one screenshot at: 

https://github.com/fgarcia/pnote
install_details:
Install as usual. Download the latest version, open with vim and...
     :so %

Make sure you have somewhere in your Vimrc file the filetype plugin enabled: 
     :filetype plugin on
